nav.div: Cloverdale Community Schools » News » What's New » CCSC Coronavirus Prevention

div.img:
Please click on the letter below from CCSC Corporation Nurse, Tiffany Shields, to see how Cloverdale Community School Corporation is working to prevent the spread of the Coronavirus (COVID-19) amongst our students.
We have also included information on frequently asked questions and the best measures to take in order to reduce the risk of contracting the virus.
COVID-19 letter (1).pdf
COVID-19 FAQs.pdf
ReduceYourRiskCOVID-19.pdf
